remarks: The meet of two lattice lines is an atom iff their join is a lattice plane.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jun-2012.)
statement:
2llnmj.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
2llnmj.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
2llnmj.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2llnmj.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
2llnmj.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
2llnmj $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. N /\ Y e. N ) -> ( ( X ./\ Y ) e. A <-> ( X .\/ Y ) e. P ) ) $.
